VBox.Label: "GET BACK INTO THE FIGHT FASTER (for only 4,000 gold)"

HTML.p: For the duration of this event, you have the option to pay 4,000 gold to resurrect with basic supplies.

If you accept, in 30 seconds you will be transported somewhere in Britain (at random) with: 40 of each reagent, 80 bandages, 4 trapped pouches, and an exceptional weapon (if you have a weapon skill), 2 greater cure, greater heal, and total refresh potions, and 2 poison potions if you have poisoning.
The cost of these items is about 1700 gold if purchased from vendors, so while you are paying a bit more than that, this will enable you to get back into the action faster!
If you resurrect during the 30 second wait time, you will NOT be moved, but you will get all the stuff.
